ch.cern.dbod.util

Class SSOHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.cern.dbod.util.SSOHelper

  • public class SSOHelper
extends Object
    This class contains methods to deal with resources behind the CERN SSO
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco

        Constructs the Scheme Registry to be used for all the HTTP clients
        Parameters:
        keyStorePath - path to key store in PKCS12 format
        keyStorePassword - password to key store
        trustStorePath - path to trust store in JKS format
        trustStorePassword - password to trust store
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException
        IOException
        NoSuchAlgorithmException
